vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.15;
son of: Jesse (H3448);
brother of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
§ Ozem = "I shall hasten them"
1) older brother of David
2) a descendant of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Jesé; hermano de David; tribu de Judá; (b)   hijo de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿鮮 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我將催促他們"
1) 大衛的哥哥
2) 猶大的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阿鲜 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我将催促他们"
1) 大卫的哥哥
2) 犹大的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.25;
son of: Jerahmeel (H3396);
brother of: Ram (H7410H), Bunah (H0946), Oren (H0767), Ahijah (H0281J) and Onam (H0208H)
§ Ozem = "I shall hasten them"
1) older brother of David
2) a descendant of Judah
